content: here s a cool pokeball bag to hold all your keepsakes from a pokemon amigurumi to pokemon cards to dice it can even work as a chalk bag or a gopro cozy it s designed as a fun drawstring pouch just tighten the cords at the ends and it closes the bag at the top this pokeball bag will also fit any of my chibi sized pokemon amigurumi patterns 1 video tutorial is also available with the free written pattern so you can crochet along with me as well happy crocheting cheers ami amour ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** make sure you tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 i d love to see **youtube** check out my youtube channel 3 to catch all my crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 5 5in tall by 5in wide 14cm tall by 13cm wide **level ** easy **need to know ** chain stitch single_crochet slip_stitch half_double_crochet how to increase how to sew parts together 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/pokemon-patterns-by-ami-amour 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
